metadata.title: CVE-2023-25744 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Mmemory safety bugs present in Firefox 109 and Firefox ESR 102.7. Some ofthese bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that withenough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrarycode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 110 and Firefox ESR < 102.8.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
